titleStmt.title: To the Prince of Venice and all his nobles which was delivered for him in his pallace and received by him in his council-chamber, being a visitation and warning of that city, which also may serve unto England and all the nations called Christian nations / written by the servant of the Lord, John.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

titleStmt.title: To the Prince of Venice and all his nobles which was delivered for him in his pallace and received by him in his council-chamber, being a visitation and warning of that city, which also may serve unto England and all the nations called Christian nations / written by the servant of the Lord, John.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Wilson, at the sign of the Black-spread-Eagle and Windmill, in Martins Le Grand,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: copy at reel 1428:11 lacks contents page, bound preceding t.p. at reel 2605:1i; copy at reel 2605:1i lacks part of p. 15-16 and all after p. 24. Both copies stained, cropped, and with missing and broken type.
Reproduction of originals in: British Library and Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
